Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	As we expand, we seek an experienced and strategic Head of Sales &amp; Marketing to drive market penetration, increase brand awareness, and accelerate revenue growth.


Role Overview


	The Head of Sales &amp; Marketing will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to drive sales, grow the brand, and expand market presence across all states in Nigeria.
	While the company already manages direct retailer relationships, this role will focus on identifying and developing new market opportunities, leading sales growth initiatives, and building a powerful brand presence.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement a sales strategy to increase revenue and market shares
	?Identify and develop new sales channels including modern trade distributors, wholesales and re commerce platforms
	?Develop marketing strategy to strengthen brand positioning and consumer engagement
	?Identify and develop new market, regions and customers segments across Nigeria
	?Lead and build a high performing sales and marketing team across Nigeria


Preferred Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s or Master&rsquo;s Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
	Experience in beauty, cosmetics, or personal care FMCG is a strong advantage.
	Proven success in launching and scaling brands in competitive markets.


Key Requirements:


	Experience: 10+ years in sales and marketing, preferably in FMCG, cosmetics, or beauty brands.
	Industry Knowledge: Deep understanding of the Nigerian retail, distribution, and consumer market.
	Sales &amp; Marketing Expertise: Proven track record in driving revenue growth and market penetration.
	Leadership Skills: Strong ability to lead sales teams and marketing professionals.
	Strategic Thinking: Ability to identify new market opportunities and develop go-to-market strategies.
	Negotiation &amp; Relationship Management: Experience in handling key accounts, retailers, and distributors.
	Digital Marketing Acumen: Familiarity with social media, influencer marketing, and e-commerce growth strategies.
	Data-Driven Decision-Making: Strong analytical skills to measure performance and adjust strategies accordingly.


Why Join Wazobia Cosmetics?


	Lead the sales and marketing strategy for a fast-growing, consumer-driven brand.
	Work in a dynamic, high-impact role with the opportunity to shape market expansion.
	Be at the forefront of an exciting and innovative FMCG company.

Head of Sales and Marketing Job at Wazobia Cosmetics




        
    

        
        Wazobia Cosmetics is a fast-growing FMCG brand in Nigeria, specializing in high-quality beauty and personal care products tailored to local consumers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Sales and Marketing

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos (with nationwide travel as required)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	As we expand, we seek an experienced and strategic Head of Sales & Marketing to drive market penetration, increase brand awareness, and accelerate revenue growth.


Role Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Head of Sales & Marketing will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to drive sales, grow the brand, and expand market presence across all states in Nigeria.
	While the company already manages direct retailer relationships, this role will focus on identifying and developing new market opportunities, leading sales growth initiatives, and building a powerful brand presence.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement a sales strategy to increase revenue and market shares
	?Identify and develop new sales channels including modern trade distributors, wholesales and re commerce platforms
	?Develop marketing strategy to strengthen brand positioning and consumer engagement
	?Identify and develop new market, regions and customers segments across Nigeria
	?Lead and build a high performing sales and marketing team across Nigeria


Preferred Qualifications


	Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
	Experience in beauty, cosmetics, or personal care FMCG is a strong advantage.
	Proven success in launching and scaling brands in competitive markets.


Key Requirements:


	Experience: 10+ years in sales and marketing, preferably in FMCG, cosmetics, or beauty brands.
	Industry Knowledge: Deep understanding of the Nigerian retail, distribution, and consumer market.
	Sales & Marketing Expertise: Proven track record in driving revenue growth and market penetration.
	Leadership Skills: Strong ability to lead sales teams and marketing professionals.
	Strategic Thinking: Ability to identify new market opportunities and develop go-to-market strategies.
	Negotiation & Relationship Management: Experience in handling key accounts, retailers, and distributors.
	Digital Marketing Acumen: Familiarity with social media, influencer marketing, and e-commerce growth strategies.
	Data-Driven Decision-Making: Strong analytical skills to measure performance and adjust strategies accordingly.


Why Join Wazobia Cosmetics?


	Lead the sales and marketing strategy for a fast-growing, consumer-driven brand.
	Work in a dynamic, high-impact role with the opportunity to shape market expansion.
	Be at the forefront of an exciting and innovative FMCG company.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover letter to: ranaejem@wazobiamax.ng using “Head of Sales & Marketing – Wazobia Cosmetics” as the subject of the email.

Accounts Receivables Officer Job at Invent Alliance Limited




        
    

        
        Invent Alliance Limited is a company specialised on creation of multi discipline business platform with specialist partnership for value co-creation in each of the different business segments through modern co-petition business principles.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Receivables Officer

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Join Our Team as an Account Receivables Officer at Invent Alliance Limited!
	Are you detail-oriented and passionate about financial accuracy and accountability?
	Invent Alliance Limited is looking for a reliable and thorough Account Receivables Officer to help us maintain financial discipline in our growing bakery operations.
	If you're a problem solver with strong integrity and a keen eye for numbers, this role is for you!


Key Responsibilities


	Daily Reconciliation: Match sales records (cash, POS, transfers) with deposits and flag discrepancies promptly.
	Receivables Management: Track customer balances, follow up on outstanding payments, and ensure prompt collections.
	Account Monitoring:Maintainup-to-date customer and supplier ledgers and provide regular ageing reports.
	Record Keeping: Accurately document all transactions andmaintainclear, audit-ready files.
	Reporting: Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reconciliation and receivables performance reports.
	Internal Collaboration: Work closely with the inventory, procurement, and sales teams tovalidatefinancial records and resolve payment or product delivery issues.
	Compliance & Escalation: Ensure adherence to financial policies and escalate anomalies or suspected fraudimmediately.


Qualifications & Skills


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
	1 - 2 years of relevant experience inaccount reconciliation or receivables, preferably in a retail, FMCG, or bakery environment
	Strong numerical and analytical skills with attention to detail
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and basic accounting tools like QuickBooks.
	Excellent record-keeping and documentation habits
	Ability to work independently and under pressure with minimal supervision
	Must demonstrate honesty, integrity, and accountability
	Must reside within Ajah, Sangotedo, or nearby locations.


Why Join Us?


	At Invent Alliance Limited, we value excellence, precision, and reliability.
	This role provides an exciting opportunity to contribute to the financial health of our business while growing your career in a structured and supportive environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: admin@inventallianceco.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more information about the role, feel free to reach out via the same email.

Job Position: Solution Architect

Job ID: 772040
Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

About this Opportunity


	We are now looking for a Delivery Solution Architect, who will be responsible for analyzing, designing, and developing commercially viable technical solutions based on the customer specifications and business needs.
	Responsible for short and long-term profitable business for Ericsson by being part of or working closely with the Core 3 team to translate the customer need and technology opportunities into detailed technical solutions. 


What you will do


	Be responsible for scope, defining and designing solution offerings; driving end-to-end technical solutions
	Analyze customer technology, define business requirements, and participate in risk analysis
	Work with core team on list of potential activities and solutions
	Develop technical presentations and lead customer discussions.
	Support deployment of solution
	Provide feedback to R&D 
	Participate in knowledge transfer, documentation, and information sharing 
	Stay abreast of on new technology/technical areas and share information about solution to enable customer competence build.


The skill you bring 


	Education: Minimum of Bachelor level in Engineering (Telecommunications or ICT) or Computer Science from a reputable university  
	Minimum 15 years of proven experience, with at least 2 years as Solution Architect applying relevant Portfolio Competence
	Solid understanding and proven experience in Core Solutions with focus on UDM and/or Communication Services portfolio
	Excellent E2E Solution Knowledge in any of the indicated domains
	Candidate should have excellent designing, solutioning and system integration, network planning, optimization, adaptation, deployment and troubleshooting skills 
	Experience in technical job roles is required, e.g., experience from work as Solution Architect and Integration Engineer
	Proven experience in deployment of cloud-based solutions. 
	Excellent Troubleshooting skills.
